category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ReqNumberExp_default_unit
preference.preference_description: Default unit type for the numerical requirement variable when users create a Validation Requirement without explicitly specifying the types for each variable used in the requirement formula. It is useful when the ReqExp_default_type is Double or Integer. The associated value depends on the value of the ReqNumberExp_default_measure preference. Valid values are included in the descriptions of unit sub LOV under the default measure in List Of Values "Model Measure Type".
